name: Kilubu Magic Potions 2
summary:
Kilubu is a quiet village ...
Until a day of curious events happens: Renée can no longer sing, Tom becomes clumsy on the job, Emir is turning red ...
All the villagers are rushing to Sacha, the sorcerer! With his famous magic potions, he will stir up solutions to all of their bizarre problems!
Using the Magic Book of Spells and some clever investigating, players work with Sacha to make the right potions for people who need your help!
